body_html:
FindOpenMP is cmake built-in function, it works very well. Cmake is born for cross-platform and compilers, cmake can handle it.

https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/module/FindOpenMP.html

I don't have a modern Intel CPU, it is hard to say it has performance improve from intel compiler.

Crack intel compiler & mkl 's cpu brand check has too much effort for tensorflow on windows.

body:
FindOpenMP is cmake built-in function, it works very well. Cmake is born for cross-platform and compilers, cmake can handle it.

https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/module/FindOpenMP.html

I don't have a modern Intel CPU, it is hard to say it has performance improve from intel compiler.

Crack intel compiler & mkl 's cpu brand check has too much effort for tensorflow on windows.
